#summary The so called marble diagrams of various implemented operators

<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />

= Introduction =

This page lists the various operators and shows a marble diagram about how they relay events. 

= Details =

== accumulate(Observable< T >, Func2< T, T, T >) : Observable< T > ==

Accumulate the Ts by using the function and relay each intermediate value to the output. The first output T appears only after the second T arrived at the input.
